title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.15 - Waiver of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 645-4.15 - Waiver of rules

State Regulations

Any of the foregoing rules may be waived by stipulation
of the parties with consent of the commission or, if a hearing officer has been
appointed, with consent of the hearing officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
645-4.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
